entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 20.
